cab.content: REPORT on the Special Workcf the'LOCAL GOVERNMENT BOARD fcr the week ending 11th hay, 19171. An order has been issued imposing on Local Authorities and their officers powers and duties in connection with the enforcement of the Food Controllers Orders.3, The preparation of the Representation of the People Bill has- continued tc engage special attention.3. . Deputations have been received on the subjects o Housing and Infant Welfare.4. Among other matters which have received special consideration may be mentionsd -(a) collection of information on co-operation among traders tc secure increased Man-power.(b) negotiations with the Pensions Ministry and the Red Cross Society as tc the residential treatment cf tuberculous soldiers.(c) the issue of an appeal for economy in water.Local Government Board.11th May, 1917
